knimeNode.name: GATKHaplotypeCaller
knimeNode.shortDescription: Call SNPs and indels simultaneously via local re-assembly of haplotypes in an active region.

fullDescription.intro: Call SNPs and indels simultaneously via local re-assembly of haplotypes in an active region. Configured for GVCF-based cohort analysis workflow. For further information, see GATK documentation of the HaplotypeCaller.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Set threshold for repeated execution. Only used if HTE is enabled in the preference page.
Set path GenomeAnalysisTK.jar and memory usage.
Coverage analysis can be restricted to genomic regions defined in a BED file.
